title: The highest-paid female athletes 2019
summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing Income in million USD on the Y-axis throughout 15 Months for Prize money, and Endorsements on the X-axis.
Over the 15 Months, the Income in million USD for both Prize money and Month have decreased.
In Month Serena Williams (tennis), Endorsements had the highest Income in million USD 250.0 among the 2 groups and in P.V. Sindhu (badminton), Prize money had the lowest Income in million USD 5.0.
In Month Naomi Osaka (tennis), Prize money had the highest Income in million USD among all 15 Months and it has the lowest Income in million USD in Month P.V. Sindhu (badminton).
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Income in million USD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 15 Months for Prize money, and Endorsements.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for Prize money and Month. In both cases, the Income in million USD have decreased.
mid_summary: This is a grouped bar chart showing Income in million USD on the Y-axis throughout 15 Months for Prize money, and Endorsements on the X-axis.
Over the 15 Months, the Income in million USD for both Prize money and Month have decreased.
In Month Serena Williams (tennis), Endorsements had the highest Income in million USD 250.0 among the 2 groups and in P.V. Sindhu (badminton), Prize money had the lowest Income in million USD 5.0.
In Month Naomi Osaka (tennis), Prize money had the highest Income in million USD among all 15 Months and it has the lowest Income in million USD in Month P.V. Sindhu (badminton).
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents Income in million USD on the Y-axis. And, how the value changed throughout 15 Months for Prize money, and Endorsements.
All through the Months, similar trend was observed for Prize money and Month. In both cases, the Income in million USD have decreased.
In Month Serena Williams (tennis), Endorsements had the highest Income in million USD 250.0 among the 2 groups and in P.V. Sindhu (badminton), Prize money had the lowest Income in million USD 5.0.
Among all the Months, Prize money had the highest Income in million USD in Month Naomi Osaka (tennis) and lowest Income in million USD in Month P.V. Sindhu (badminton).
Month Naomi Osaka (tennis) and P.V. Sindhu (badminton) had the biggest gap of 78.0 between the highest and lowest Income in million USD found for Prize money.
Among all 2 groups, Prize money had the gap of 78.0 between the maximum and minimum Income in million USD observed in Month Naomi Osaka (tennis) and P.V. Sindhu (badminton) respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups Prize money, and Endorsements, the Month Serena Williams (tennis) is the maximum Income in million USD and Ariya Jutanugarn (golf) is the minimum Income in million USD.
